com.eemi.ext4j.client.chart.axis

Class TimeAxis

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.eemi.ext4j.client.core.JsObject
      • com.eemi.ext4j.client.chart.axis.AbstractAxis
        • com.eemi.ext4j.client.chart.axis.NumericAxis
          • com.eemi.ext4j.client.chart.axis.TimeAxis

  • public class TimeAxis
extends NumericAxis
    A type of axis whose units are measured in time values. Use this axis for listing dates that you will want to group or dynamically change. If you just want to display dates as categories then use the Category class for axis instead.
